noun.description: A quantity having direction as well as magnitude, especially as determining the position of one point in space relative to another.
An organism, typically a biting insect or tick, that transmits a disease or parasite from one animal or plant to another.
A course to be taken by an aircraft.

verb.description: Direct (an aircraft in flight) to a desired point.
examples: two Hurricanes were vectored towards the Stukas

origin: Mid 19th century: from Latin, literally carrier, from vehere convey.
